description: Care home residents will be among the first to get Covid-19 vaccines, the Manx government says.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man vaccines for vulnerable to take over three months
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man vaccines for vulnerable to take over three months - BBC News
maintext: Despite the approval of the vaccine, the island's border will remain closed to almost all non-residents for the time being but will be reviewed in the new year, Mr Ashford said.
